I am an Assistant Professor in the [Department of Economics at the University of Oklahoma](https://www.ou.edu/cas/economics). 

My research interests include:

-   Spatial economics
-   International trade
-   Development economics

Please see my [Curriculum Vitae](Huynh_Nghiem_CV.pdf){target="_blank"} for more details. I can be reached at nqh@ou.edu.
